2082.subject: RUS
2082.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the second semester of Russian. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in RUS 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in RUS 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in RUS 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in RUS 201 or 202.
